name: tab-origin
title: Tab Origin
description: Return to the page from which you opened this tab.
author: Peter Elmers

preferences.name: switchIfPossible
preferences.title: Switch if possible
preferences.description: Switch to origin tab if it's already open

preferences.name: showContextMenu
preferences.title: Show context menu
preferences.description: Display 'Back to Origin Tab' in the right-click menu on the tab bar

preferences.name: hotkey
preferences.title: Hotkey
preferences.description: Press this key to open the active tab's origin location
